main_title: The Near Miss That Almost Stopped Apollo 11
hook: [nervous] Just hours before Neil Armstrong's historic moonwalk in 1969, a malfunction in Apollo 11â€™s guidance system threatened everything! Mission Control frantically diagnosed the issue, knowing that a single failure could delay lunar exploration for years.
description: Just hours before Apollo 11's launch, a system failure almost doomed the mission! What happened next changed everything. #Apollo11 #MoonLanding #NASA
